about_the_game:
Snowless Night is a VR adventure in a world where darkness has taken over the light and Christmas is on the brink of extinction. You will take on the role of an elite soldier from the International Magic Crisis Control Administration and embark on an epic journey to fight powerful enemies and restore the lost hope to the world.

Main features of the game:

  • Gloomy World: Explore a dark and dangerous world where magic and technology intertwine to create a unique atmosphere.
  • Epic Battles: Fight dangerous enemies and powerful bosses using an arsenal of advanced weapon technology.
  • Intriguing story: Discover the truth behind the fall of Christmas and uncover the secrets hidden in the shadows.
  • Customization and Upgrades: Upgrade your weapons and equipment to become stronger and prepare for the toughest challenges.
  • Early Access: Get the chance to be the first to dive into the game when Early Access launches in Fall 2024.

Can you stop the impending chaos and bring light back to the world? Become the hero who will change the fate of Christmas!
